title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 12, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 12, 2020
description:
"DP and the boys recap losing the Sports Emmy for the 3rd year in a row. With the Big Ten and PAC 12 cancelling their football seasons, Dan starts to look ahead to the next shoe to drop in the sport. Plus we're joined by CBS Sports College Football Analyst Rick Neuheisel, ESPN's Kirk Herbstreit and HOF QB Joe Montana."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
